author: KarolWes
title: Classic color buggy
review:
I didn't plan to buy this set, but due some promotions I bought it half-price. And when I looking at it right now, I sure I will also buy it full-price.

Model I - Buggy

It's a first car this type I've get. There were some vehicles like this in the past (list here), but I think this is one of the best, at lest in Creator series. Model is very compact, strong and looks simple, but still is nicely detailed. It has some really good looking parts, like big floodlight at the front, rear exhaust pipe (which could be a little bigger) and big engine section. Also rear spoiler looks great. I like that the shape isn't much angular, has a lot of curves, also some parts mounted on side, which upgrade its look. Cage over a seat is great and really simple. Model is designed in nearly minifig scale, so you can put driver inside. The step made out of plates with bar is a great thing too.

Model II - Plane

Model is very simple and straightforward. In my opinion it looks poor. It isn't great. It has the shape of a plane, horizontal rudder is fine, but vertical is done wrong. Rear is done quite well with slopes at the side. Wings are good, as well as canopy. Engine is ok, but i think it's a little bit too big. Small slopes behind engine makes a great work, but those wings under them looks weird and not on place. Overall it's not the best, but also not the worst.

Model III - Quad bike

Though it's the smallest model it this set, it is a great thing. Quad looks very realistic. It is a little bigger than minifig scale, but when you put rider on it, it doesn't look bad. I like the usage of bumper part as a windscreen. Big engine put in the place where should be legs of a driver looks kinda weird, but funny. Mask in designed nicely, as well as back. There is nothing to complain about. It's just a small, simple, yet great model.

Pieces

Biggest advantage of those parts is that they are in rather typical color. Unusual colors are nice, but those classic ones are more useful. And so we have here parts in yellow, blue and white. There is a lot of 2x3 wing plates (four pairs) some 2x2 wings, couple of curves, really nice looking halfcircled plate, and this part - slope with tile (I duuno how to describe it so I give U a link). 2x2 round brick with grill also is quite nice.

Summary

  • Dune buggy is great, one of the best models of this type.
  • Plane is bad, simple, designed poor.
  • Quad bike is a fine model even though is very simple.
  • Classic colors are great.
  • Parts are nice and useful.
  • Price is ok.
